text: Ndipo iwo akukufunsa za msambo. Nena: “Uwu ndi umve. Motero aleweni akazi panthawi ya msambo ndipo musawakhudze mpaka atayeretsedwa. Ndipo akayeretsedwa, mukhoza kukhala nawo malo amodzi monga momwe Mulungu adakulamulirani. Ndithudi Mulungu amakonda iwo amene amadza ndi kulapa kwa Iye. Ndipo Iye amakonda iwo wodziyeretsa.”
